message.body: Could you? I need the hose for the vacuum. Brian is there or working on his place.
R u around? I could drop off that festool sander
Y
Yes
Be there in 15
Ok, I need to look at records because we need to make sure that tax payment and company buy-out aren't included
Which tax payment?
Oh the stuff comp paid for your taxes?
If you can find that it would help. But I think the buyout counts since that is income on your side and expense on mine.
The money that was transferred to me for taxes that was from mutually saved tax money
I think I have it in email or my day planner
You can deduct it but it isn't income for me since I already paid for all that stuff
Ah. Right so it is just a purchase on my end and you'd only pay sales tax if anything?
Though I can't imagine it would come to that.
It's the same as if I sold that stuff to you, not compensation for labor
Yup
You should definitely deduct it as tools etc though
I'll look through what I can find. When do you need this stuff. I am a bit slammed till I finish kurts but I could work on it at night if its a huge rush
It's going to take me a week to get it all together anyway so just do it when you can.
Cool.
Ok I am on board with doing our taxes promptly
